reviews.review_msg: He is okay in the lecture but is fairly unpproachable in his office hour. During the lecture, he usually talked broad rather than focusing one topic. Better to have a good TA who grade the exams and tutorials.

Had mbb222,403 etc. Very intelligent professor.He knows his stuff well and is always willing to help.Got my buddy into med school because of his reference letters. He uses big words because that's just how he talks.Great prof, be willing to learn and ask questions. Think conceptually,listen to his lectures and take notes. Best class ever and easy.
